de.lambeck.pned.gui.menuBar

Class MenuBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JMenuBar
            • de.lambeck.pned.gui.menuBar.MenuBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement

    public class MenuBar
extends javax.swing.JMenuBar
    Implements the menu bar for the Petri net editor.

    Note: Holds references to:
    - A parent component (to position dialogs)
    - The application controller (to pass this reference to action objects)
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
